( T ) 's acquisition of DirecTV also ends its investment in America Movil SAB , while building a stronger competitor to the mobile - phone provider that gave it access to the fast - growing Latin American market for more than two decades .
DirecTV competes with Mexico City - based America Movil in selling pay - TV and Internet services in countries including Brazil and Colombia , with 18 million subscribers across Latin America .
